note.p: Education: Caius College, Cambridge. BA (1855), MA

Career: Fellow of Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge; Staff, Geological Survey of England and Wales (1861-1874); Professor of Geology, Yorkshire College of Science, Leeds (1870-1888); wrote 'A Manual of Physical Geology' (1876); Professor of Geology, University of Oxford (1888); died of a paralytic stroke
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1897-1898 vol 62 pp v-ix signed by C L
